review_title: An excellent Non-profit organization with great core values and visionary
job_title: Anonymous Employee in Bandung, West Java
pros:
-very strong vision and mission
-great core values
-international culture
-good salary (applied as local country standard).
cons:
- too many hierarchy like manager, director and region of area (continent such as Asia region, etc).
- very rigid with the policies
-too many changes and very long process, and it's not done yet and also start with a new changes. 
- Stuck position (hard to growing in the position)
